https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/r8nLI2052swGQ53p5eVVPuEzlAf.jpg An unexpected phone call brings an elderly woman to her childhood country cottage, and memories of an orphan boy she knew 47 years ago come flooding back to her. A Werewolf Boy
